text: Federica Sanfilippo (born 24 October 1990) is an Italian biathlete. She competes in the Biathlon World Cup, and represented Italy at the Biathlon World Championships 2016 in Holmenkollen. ==World Cup== ===Podiums=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Season!! title: Federica Sanfilippo
